name: WebApp Best Practices Implementation
description: Transform the webapp into a polished, professional web application that follows modern web best practices while maintaining full mobile app compatibility. CRITICAL: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - all changes must use environment.isWeb checks.

userStories.title: Fix loading spinners that don't clear properly
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Audit all pages and ensure loading spinners clear when navigation completes, when returning to a page, and after errors. Acceptance: All loading states clear when navigation completes; Loading states clear when returning to a page (ionViewWillEnter); No orphaned spinners remain after errors; All changes wrapped in environment.isWeb check.

userStories.title: Implement skeleton loaders for content
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Replace simple spinners with skeleton loaders for better perceived performance on project cards, service lists, and images. Acceptance: Project cards show skeleton placeholders while loading; Service lists show skeleton placeholders; Images show placeholder shimmer effect.

userStories.title: Add progress indicators for long operations
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Show progress percentage for PDF generation, file uploads, and batch operations. Acceptance: PDF generation shows progress percentage; File uploads show progress bar; Batch operations show item count progress.

userStories.title: Implement proper browser back/forward support
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Ensure browser navigation buttons work correctly throughout the webapp with proper history management. Acceptance: Back button returns to previous page with correct state; Forward button works after going back; Deep linking works for all routes; No duplicate history entries.

userStories.title: Add breadcrumb navigation for deep pages
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Show users where they are in the app hierarchy on Project Detail, Service pages (EFE, HUD, LBW, DTE), and Category detail pages. Acceptance: Breadcrumbs visible on Project Detail page; Breadcrumbs visible on all service pages; Breadcrumbs are clickable links; Only shown on webapp (environment.isWeb).

userStories.title: Add route guards for unsaved changes
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Warn users before navigating away from pages with unsaved changes. Works with browser back button and in-app navigation. Acceptance: Confirmation dialog shown when leaving with unsaved changes; Works with browser back button; Works with in-app navigation; User can choose to stay or leave.

userStories.title: Add real-time form validation
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Validate form fields as users type with inline error messages. Acceptance: Required fields show validation on blur; Email/phone fields validate format; Error messages appear inline near the field; Submit button disabled until form is valid.

userStories.title: Implement autosave for forms
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Automatically save form progress to localStorage to prevent data loss. Acceptance: Form data saved to localStorage periodically; Prompt to restore on page reload; Clear saved data on successful submit.

userStories.title: Add keyboard navigation support for forms
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Allow full form completion using keyboard only with logical tab order. Acceptance: Tab order is logical; Enter submits forms where appropriate; Escape closes modals/dialogs; Arrow keys work in dropdowns.

userStories.title: Implement global error boundary
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Catch and handle unexpected errors gracefully with user-friendly messages and recovery options. Acceptance: Unhandled errors show user-friendly message; Option to retry or go back; Errors logged for debugging; App doesn't crash completely.

userStories.title: Add retry mechanisms for failed API calls
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Automatically retry failed requests with exponential backoff and user feedback. Note: Status options retry already implemented in ensureStatusOptionsLoaded(). Acceptance: Failed requests retry up to 3 times; User informed of retry attempts; Manual retry option after all retries fail.

userStories.title: Add offline detection and handling
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Detect when user goes offline, show clear indication, and queue actions for when back online. Acceptance: Clear indication when offline; Actions queued for when back online; Graceful degradation of features.

userStories.title: Implement virtual scrolling for long lists
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Use virtual scrolling for project lists and service lists with 100+ items. Acceptance: Lists with 100+ items scroll smoothly; Memory usage stays constant regardless of list size; Search/filter works with virtual scrolling.

userStories.title: Lazy load images with intersection observer
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Only load images when they enter the viewport with placeholder shown until loaded. Acceptance: Images below the fold don't load initially; Placeholder shown until image loads; No layout shift when images load.

userStories.title: Optimize Angular change detection
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Use OnPush change detection strategy where possible to reduce unnecessary re-renders. Acceptance: Critical components use OnPush; Manual change detection only when needed; No unnecessary re-renders.

userStories.title: Implement request caching and deduplication
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Cache API responses and prevent duplicate simultaneous requests. Acceptance: Identical requests within short window are deduplicated; Cache invalidation on mutations; Stale-while-revalidate strategy for non-critical data.

userStories.title: Add proper ARIA labels and roles
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Ensure all interactive elements have proper ARIA attributes for screen readers. Acceptance: All buttons have accessible names; Form fields have associated labels; Dynamic content has aria-live regions; Modals have proper focus management.

userStories.title: Ensure keyboard accessibility
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. All functionality must be available via keyboard with visible focus indicators. Acceptance: Focus visible on all interactive elements; No keyboard traps; Skip links for main content; Logical tab order.

userStories.title: Add screen reader announcements
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Announce important state changes to screen reader users using aria-live regions. Acceptance: Loading states announced; Form errors announced; Success messages announced; Page changes announced.

userStories.title: Ensure sufficient color contrast
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. All text must meet WCAG AA contrast requirements (4.5:1 for normal, 3:1 for large text). Acceptance: Normal text has 4.5:1 contrast ratio; Large text has 3:1 contrast ratio; UI components have 3:1 contrast ratio.

userStories.title: Add hover states for all interactive elements
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Clear visual feedback on hover for buttons, links, and cards. Acceptance: Buttons change appearance on hover; Links have hover underline or color change; Cards have subtle lift/shadow on hover; Cursor changes appropriately (pointer for clickable).

userStories.title: Add smooth transition animations
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Smooth CSS transitions for state changes, page transitions, and expanding/collapsing sections. Acceptance: Page transitions are smooth; Expanding/collapsing sections animate; Modals fade in/out; No janky or abrupt visual changes.

userStories.title: Implement toast notifications
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Non-blocking toast notifications for success and info messages that auto-dismiss. Acceptance: Success actions show toast notification; Toasts auto-dismiss after timeout; Can be manually dismissed; Don't block user interaction.

userStories.title: Add confirmation dialogs for destructive actions
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Require user confirmation before delete/remove actions with clear description. Acceptance: Delete actions require confirmation; Clear description of what will be deleted; Option to cancel; Keyboard accessible (Enter to confirm, Escape to cancel).

userStories.title: Audit and fix tablet breakpoints
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Ensure layouts work well on tablet-sized screens with no horizontal scrolling. Acceptance: No horizontal scrolling at any breakpoint; Touch targets are at least 44x44px; Text remains readable; Images scale appropriately.

userStories.title: Optimize desktop layouts
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Take advantage of larger screens with side-by-side layouts and multi-column lists. Acceptance: Side-by-side layouts where appropriate; Reasonable max-width for content (1200-1400px); Multi-column layouts for project/service lists; Efficient use of whitespace.

userStories.title: Add dynamic page titles
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Set unique page titles based on current view for better browser tab identification. Acceptance: Each page has unique title; Title reflects current content (e.g., project address); Browser tab shows meaningful text.

userStories.title: Audit and fix XSS vulnerabilities
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Ensure all user input is properly sanitized using Angular's built-in sanitization. Acceptance: No innerHTML with unsanitized user content; All dynamic content properly escaped; Angular's DomSanitizer used where needed.

userStories.title: Audit sensitive data handling
userStories.description: IMPORTANT: DO NOT TOUCH MOBILE APP - wrap all changes in environment.isWeb check. Ensure no sensitive data stored insecurely in localStorage or logged to console. Acceptance: No passwords stored client-side; Auth tokens have appropriate expiry; Sensitive data not logged to console in production; Clear data on logout.
